title: Outnumbered star Tyger Drew Honey confronts man who 'flashed him'
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Outnumbered star Tyger Drew-Honey has revealed the moment he confronted a man who allegedly flashed him on a beach in Spain.

He was out on a beach in Denia over the weekend when he claims he saw a man ‘masturbating’.

Tyger confronted the man and filmed the heated exchange, which he shared with Olive Press.

In the footage the 23-year-old says: ‘I’ve just been flashed by this guy on the beach.’

The man, whose face is obscured, tells him to stop filming, to which Tyger replies: ‘Yeah mate, well you need to stop walking around on the beach flashing young men..

‘This man just flashed me. I have officially been flashed.’

Explaining the incident, the actor said he first noticed the man ‘circling’ him while he was sat on the beach.

He then caught the man ‘licking his lips’, after which Tyger began to ‘hurl abuse’ at him to get him to stop.

Tyger filmed a heated exchange with a man he alleges ‘flashed’ him on a beach (Picture: Olive Press)

The actor decided to ‘shame’ the man (Picture: Olive Press)

Tyger explained: ‘I hurled abuse at him and he whipped his private parts away, and then just sat there.

‘It occurred to me as I was walking away that I should shame him, so I went back to film.’

The 23-year-old decided to ‘shame’ the man (Picture: Getty Images)

In the footage the man, wearing a cap, a pale blue T-shirt and green shorts, appears to have his flies open.

Tyger added that he did not report the alleged incident to the police as he is set to return to the UK to continue his tour with the play Posh.

Tyger plays Jake in BBC comedy Outnumbered (Picture: BBC)

Tyger is close friends with his Outnumbered co-stars Daniel Roche and Ramona Marquez (Picture: Instagram)

The actor has played Jake in the BBC comedy since 2007 opposite Hugh Dennis and Claire Skinner.

He is good mates with his young co-stars Daniel Roche and Ramona Marquez who play his siblings Ben and Karen, with the trio often making headlines whenever they hang out together.
